pageContent: Purpose: Focal therapy (FT) offers an alternative approach for prostate cancer (PCa) treatment in selected patients. However, little is known on its actual establishment in health care reality.

metaData.source:
Acute and subacute prostate MRI findings after MRI-guided transurethral ultrasound ablation of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33251811/
